item.title: Kadane's Algorithm
item.description: Kadane’s Algorithm # c++ int maxSubArraySum(int a[], int size) { int max_so_far = INT_MIN, max_ending_here = 0; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { max_ending_here = max_ending_here + a[i]; if (max_so_far < max_ending_here) max_so_far = max_ending_here; if (max_ending_here < 0) max_ending_here = 0; } return max_so_far; }
